SEARCH
Package com.insebre.project.controller

Class DataController

java.lang.Object
com.insebre.project.controller.DataController
public class DataController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing program data and file I/O operations. This class handles loading, saving, and manipulating program data stored in a file.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ismael Semmar Galvez

  • Constructor Details

    • DataController

      public DataController()

  • Method Details

    • loadData

      public static void loadData()
      Loads program data from the file "programs.dat". If the file does not exist, it creates an empty file and displays a message. Handles exceptions related to file operations and data corruption.

    • saveData

      public static void saveData()
      Saves the program data to the file "programs.dat". Handles exceptions related to file not found or other I/O errors.

    • getData

      public static Program[] getData()
      Retrieves the array of program data.
      Returns:
      The array of Program objects.

    • setData

      public static void setData(Program[] newData)
      Sets the array of program data to a new array.
      Parameters:
      newData - The new array of Program objects.

    • reallocateDataObjects

      public static void reallocateDataObjects()
      Reallocates the array of program data to remove null elements.

    • getParsedPrograms

      public static Object[][] getParsedPrograms()
      Converts the program data into a 2D array for display purposes.
      Returns:
      A 2D array representing the parsed program data.

    • getParsedProgramVersions

      public static Object[][] getParsedProgramVersions(int programIndex)
      Converts the program versions of a specific program into a 2D array for display purposes.
      Parameters:
      programIndex - The index of the program in the data array.
      Returns:
      A 2D array representing the parsed program versions.

    • addProgramVersion

      public static void addProgramVersion(int programIndex, String version, String releaseDate, String commits)
      Adds a new version to the program at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      programIndex - The index of the program in the data array.
      version - The version number of the new version.
      releaseDate - The release date of the new version.
      commits - The commits associated with the new version.

    • editProgramVersion

      public static void editProgramVersion(int programIndex, int versionIndex, String version, String releaseDate, String commits)
      Edits an existing program version at the specified indices.
      Parameters:
      programIndex - The index of the program in the data array.
      versionIndex - The index of the version to be edited.
      version - The updated version number.
      releaseDate - The updated release date.
      commits - The updated commits.

    • deleteProgramVersion

      public static void deleteProgramVersion(int programIndex, int versionIndex)
      Deletes an existing program version at the specified indices.
      Parameters:
      programIndex - The index of the program in the data array.
      versionIndex - The index of the version to be deleted.

    • switchProgramSuperCollectionType

      public static void switchProgramSuperCollectionType(int programIndex)
      Switches the collection type used for program versions at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      programIndex - The index of the program in the data array.
